uk.ac.ebi.masscascade.utilities.range

Class ToleranceRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.masscascade.utilities.range.ExtendableRange
      • uk.ac.ebi.masscascade.utilities.range.ToleranceRange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Range>, Range
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovingRange

    public class ToleranceRange
extends ExtendableRange
    Class implementing a range that is created from an initial value x and a tolerance in ppm. The range is defined as x +/- (x * ppm / 10^6)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      ToleranceRange()
